synopsis.text: Mao's journey as the top idol Hana in Aikatsu Planet is the central focus of Aikatsu Planet! The Movie, a cinematic adaptation of the Aikatsu Planet! series. As a second-year student at Seirei Private High School, Mao's life takes a dramatic turn after the Planet Princess Grand Prix, leaving her with a packed schedule. Despite the demands on her time, Mao remains committed to expressing her gratitude to her fans, who have touched and transformed her life. To show her appreciation, she organizes the 'Aikatsu Planet! Gratitude Festival'. Little does anyone know, Mao's rise to stardom as Hana began when she stepped into the role left vacant by the disappearance of Meisa Hinata, Hana's previous alter ego. Join Mao in her heartwarming quest to give back to those who have supported her in this captivating tale of music, friendship, and self-discovery.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
